info.title: Azure Load Testing
info.description: These APIs allow end users to create, view and run load tests using Azure Load Test Service.

patch.summary: Create a new test or update an existing test.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Load test model

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete a test by its name.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get load test details by test name

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all load tests by the fully qualified resource Id e.g subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.LoadTestService/loadtests/{resName}.

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Sort on the supported fields in (field asc/desc) format. eg: lastModifiedDateTime asc. Supported fields - lastModifiedDateTime

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Prefix based, case sensitive search on searchable fields - displayName, createdBy. For example, to search for a test, with display name is Login Test, the search parameter can be Login.

parameters.name: lastModifiedStartTime
parameters.description: Start DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the last updated time range to filter tests.

parameters.name: lastModifiedEndTime
parameters.description: End DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of the last updated time range to filter tests.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description: Number of results in response.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

put.summary: Upload input file for a given test name. File size can't be more than 50 MB. Existing file with same name for the given test will be overwritten. File should be provided in the request body as application/octet-stream.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: Unique name for test file with file extension like : App.jmx

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: File type

values.description: If file is not any of other supported type

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The file content as application/octet-stream.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get test file by the file name.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: File name with file extension like app.jmx

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete file by the file name for a test

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: File name with file extension like app.jmx

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

200.description: The URLs for the requested test files.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Associate an app component (collection of azure resources) to a test

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: App Component model.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get associated app component (collection of azure resources) for the given test.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Configure server metrics for a test

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Server metric configuration model.

200.description: The server metrics config is updated.

201.description: The server metrics config is created.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: List server metrics configuration for the given test.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Create and start a new test run with the given name.

parameters.name: oldTestRunId
parameters.description: Existing test run identifier that should be rerun, if this is provided, the test will run with the JMX file, configuration and app components from the existing test run. You can override the configuration values for new test run in the request body.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Load test run model

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get test run details by name.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.summary: Delete a test run by its name.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get test run file by file name.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: Test run file name with file extension

200.description: The URL for the requested test run file

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get all test runs with given filters

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Sort on the supported fields in (field asc/desc) format. eg: executedDateTime asc. Supported fields - executedDateTime

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Prefix based, case sensitive search on searchable fields - description, executedUser. For example, to search for a test run, with description 500 VUs, the search parameter can be 500.

parameters.name: executionFrom
parameters.description: Start DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of test-run execution time filter range.

parameters.name: executionTo
parameters.description: End DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format) of test-run execution time filter range.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Comma separated list of test run status.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description: Number of results in response.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

200.description: The requested test run is getting cancelled. Call GET /test-runs/{testRunId} to check the status.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: List the metric namespaces for a load test run.

200.description: Successful request to get the list of metric namespaces

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: List the metric definitions for a load test run.

parameters.name: metricNamespace
parameters.description: Metric namespace to query metric definitions for.

200.description: The requested load test metrics definition

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

post.summary: List the metric values for a load test run.

parameters.name: aggregation
parameters.description: The aggregation

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The interval (i.e. timegrain) of the query.

values.description: 5 seconds, available only if test run duration is less than 10 minutes
10 seconds, available only if test run duration is less than 10 minutes
5 minutes, available only if test run duration is greater than 1 minute
1 hour, available only if test run duration is greater than 1 minute

parameters.name: metricname
parameters.description: Metric name

parameters.name: metricNamespace
parameters.description: Metric namespace to query metric definitions for.

parameters.name: timespan
parameters.description: The timespan of the query. It is a string with the following format 'startDateTime_ISO/endDateTime_ISO'.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Metric dimension filter

200.description: The requested load test run metrics

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: List the dimension values for the given metric dimension name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Dimension name

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The interval (i.e. timegrain) of the query.

values.description: 5 seconds, available only if test run duration is less than 10 minutes
10 seconds, available only if test run duration is less than 10 minutes
5 minutes, available only if test run duration is greater than 1 minute
1 hour, available only if test run duration is greater than 1 minute

parameters.name: metricname
parameters.description: Metric name

parameters.name: metricNamespace
parameters.description: Metric namespace to query metric definitions for.

parameters.name: timespan
parameters.description: The timespan of the query. It is a string with the following format 'startDateTime_ISO/endDateTime_ISO'.

200.description: The requested dimension values for the given dimension.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Associate an app component (collection of azure resources) to a test run

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: App Component model.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get associated app component (collection of azure resources) for the given test run.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

patch.summary: Configure server metrics for a test run

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Server metric configuration model.

200.description: The server metrics config is updated.

201.description: The server metrics config is created.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: List server metrics configuration for the given test run.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

AppComponent.description: An Azure resource object (Refer azure generic resource model : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/resources/resources/get-by-id#genericresource)

resourceName.description: Azure resource name, required while creating the app component.

resourceType.description: Azure resource type, required while creating the app component.

resourceGroup.description: Resource group name of the Azure resource

subscriptionId.description: Subscription Id of the Azure resource

value.description: The value of the certificate for respective type

values.description: If the certificate is stored in an Azure Key Vault

DimensionFilter.description: Dimension name and values to filter

values.description: The dimension values. Maximum values can be 20.

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of values in case of paginated results, if applicable

ErrorDetails.description: Error details if there is any failure in load test run

message.description: Error details in case test run was not successfully run.

ErrorResponseBody.description: The definition of an error object.

values.description: If file is not any of other supported type

expireDateTime.description: Expiry time of the file (ISO 8601 literal format)

nextLink.description: Link for the next list of file URLs, if applicable

engineInstances.description: The number of engine instances to execute load test. Supported values are in range of 1-45. Required for creating a new test.

splitAllCSVs.description: If false, Azure Load Testing copies and processes your input files unmodified across all test engine instances. If true, Azure Load Testing splits the CSV input data evenly across all engine instances. If you provide multiple CSV files, each file will be split evenly.

quickStartTest.description: If true, optionalLoadTestConfig is required and JMX script for the load test is not required to upload.

MetricAvailability.description: Metric availability specifies the time grain (aggregation interval or frequency)

timeGrain.description: The time grain specifies the aggregation interval for the metric. Expressed as a duration 'PT1M', 'PT1H', etc.

values.description: 5 seconds, available only if test run duration is less than 10 minutes
10 seconds, available only if test run duration is less than 10 minutes
5 minutes, available only if test run duration is greater than 1 minute
1 hour, available only if test run duration is greater than 1 minute

namespace.description: The namespace the metric belongs to.

primaryAggregationType.description: The primary aggregation type value defining how to use the values for display.

values.description: Aggregation will be average in this case

supportedAggregationTypes.description: The collection of what all aggregation types are supported.

metricAvailabilities.description: Metric availability specifies the time grain (aggregation interval or frequency).

value.description: the values for the metric definitions.

MetricNamespace.description: Metric namespace class specifies the metadata for a metric namespace.

value.description: The values for the metric namespaces.

MetricRequestPayload.description: Filters to fetch the set of metric

filters.description: Get metrics for specific dimension values. Example: Metric contains dimension like SamplerName, Error. To retrieve all the time series data where SamplerName is equals to HTTPRequest1 or HTTPRequest2, the DimensionFilter value will be {"SamplerName", ["HTTPRequest1", "HTTPRequest2"}

timestamp.description: The timestamp for the metric value in ISO 8601 format.

Metrics.description: The response to a metrics query.

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of timeseries in case of paginated results, if applicable

endpointUrl.description: Test URL. Provide the complete HTTP URL. For example, http://contoso-app.azurewebsites.net/login

PassFailCriteria.description: Pass fail criteria for a test.

passFailMetrics.description: Map of id and pass fail metrics { id  : pass fail metrics }.

clientMetric.description: The client metric on which the criteria should be applied.

values.description: Pass fail criteria for response time metric
Pass fail criteria for response time metric
Pass fail criteria for error metric
Pass fail criteria for total requests
Pass fail criteria for request rate.

aggregate.description: The aggregation function to be applied on the client metric. Allowed functions - percentage - for error metric , avg, p50, p90, p95, p99, min, max - for response_time_ms and latency metric, avg - for requests_per_sec, count - for requests

values.description: Criteria applies for given percentage value

requestName.description: Request name for which the Pass fail criteria has to be applied

value.description: The value to compare with the client metric. Allowed values - error : [0.0 , 100.0] unit- % , response_time_ms and latency : any integer value unit- ms.

action.description: Action taken after the threshold is met. Default is continue.

values.description: Test will continue to run even if pass fail metric criteria metric gets failed
Test run will stop if pass fail criteria metric is not passed.

actualValue.description: The actual value of the client metric for the test run.

values.description: Given pass fail criteria metric has passed.
Given pass fail criteria metric couldn't determine.
Given pass fail criteria metric has failed.

ResourceMetric.description: Associated metric definition for particular metrics of the azure resource ( Refer : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/monitor/metric-definitions/list#metricdefinition).

name.description: The invariant value of metric name

value.description: The value of the secret for the respective type

values.description: If the secret is stored in an Azure Key Vault
If the Plain text secret value provided

secrets.description: Secrets can be stored in an Azure Key Vault or any other secret store. If the secret is stored in an Azure Key Vault, the value should be the secret identifier and the type should be AKV_SECRET_URI. If the secret is stored elsewhere, the secret value should be provided directly and the type should be SECRET_VALUE.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables which are defined as a set of <name,value> pairs.

subnetId.description: Subnet ID on which the load test instances should run.

keyvaultReferenceIdentityType.description: Type of the managed identity referencing the Key vault.

keyvaultReferenceIdentityId.description: Resource Id of the managed identity referencing the Key vault.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last Modified datetime(ISO 8601 literal format).

components.description: Azure resource collection { resource id (fully qualified resource Id e.g subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.LoadTestService/loadtests/{resName}) : resource object }

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last Modified datetime(ISO 8601 literal format).

TestInputArtifacts.description: The input artifacts for the test.

additionalFileInfo.description: Additional supported files for the test run

secrets.description: Secrets can be stored in an Azure Key Vault or any other secret store. If the secret is stored in an Azure Key Vault, the value should be the secret identifier and the type should be AKV_SECRET_URI. If the secret is stored elsewhere, the secret value should be provided directly and the type should be SECRET_VALUE.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables which are defined as a set of <name,value> pairs.

errorDetails.description: Error details if there is any failure in load test run

testResult.description: Test result for pass/Fail criteria used during the test run.

virtualUsers.description: Number of virtual users, for which test has been run.

testRunId.description: Unique test run name as identifier

values.description: Test run is not yet started.
Test run request is getting cancelled
Test run JMX file is validated
Test run JMX file validation is failed

startDateTime.description: The test run start DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format).

endDateTime.description: The test run end DateTime(ISO 8601 literal format).

subnetId.description: Subnet ID on which the load test instances should run.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last Modified datetime(ISO 8601 literal format).

components.description: Azure resource collection { resource id (fully qualified resource Id e.g subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.LoadTestService/loadtests/{resName}) : resource object }

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last Modified datetime(ISO 8601 literal format).

TestRunInputArtifacts.description: The input artifacts for the test run.

additionalFileInfo.description: Additional supported files for the test run

TestRunOutputArtifacts.description: The output artifacts for the test run.

metrics.description: Azure resource metrics collection {metric id : metrics object} (Refer : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/monitor/metric-definitions/list#metricdefinition for metric id).

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last Modified datetime(ISO 8601 literal format).

nextLink.description: Link for the next list of test runs in case of paginated results, if applicable

metrics.description: Azure resource metrics collection {metric id : metrics object} (Refer : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/monitor/metric-definitions/list#metricdefinition for metric id).

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last Modified datetime(ISO 8601 literal format).

nextLink.description: Link for the next list of tests in case of paginated results, if applicable

TimeSeriesElement.description: The time series returned when a data query is performed.

data.description: An array of data points representing the metric values.

TestIdQueryParameter.name: testId
TestIdQueryParameter.description: Unique name of an existing load test.

TestIdPathParameter.name: testId
TestIdPathParameter.description: Unique name for the load test, must contain only lower-case alphabetic, numeric, underscore or hyphen characters.

TestRunIdPathParameter.name: testRunId
TestRunIdPathParameter.description: Unique name for the load test run, must contain only lower-case alphabetic, numeric, underscore or hyphen characters.

Endpoint.name: Endpoint
Endpoint.description: URL to perform data plane API operations on the resource.

OAuth2 scope for Azure Load Test Service
